On the mission, other CIA agents may ask you test questions to make sure you are trusted. The questions are often personal and may sound silly, but they all require one of a few very specific answers. Below are a small part of the questions and correct answers.

The trusted agent test requires you to answer "This is sensitive information, classified as Top Secret." to "What is your biggest turn-off about the opposite sex?"
Your answer for "Are you involved in any local political organizations?" should be "This is sensitive information, classified as Official."
